content.description: One hand on bump and one hand slightly left to good crimp on shelf. Bump up to right-trailing edge, pull yourself up to ledge and find purchase on top of boulder to top out.

On far left of face nearest to approach trail on "Bolted Boulder". Start with left hand on good positive edge and right hand on obvious bump on shelf. Drive up for dynamic move to catch right-trailing edge directly above your head with right hand, and work up until you get enough purchase to top out.
content.location: First large boulder on approach trail at 302; around mile marker 45. Boulder has two bolts mounted on blank face.

content.description: Start standing with obvious undercling for left and right hand on whatever you can find on the arete. Figure out how to get to the obvious hold below lip and top out straight up. Sit start?
content.location: On first good sized boulder on the left you'll encounter as you walk in. This climbs the trail side arete, right of the bolt ladder.

pathTokens: Hatties Garden Parking Boulders ( originally "Notch Boulders")

content.description: Walking in on the trail from Rt 302 this is the first, super-obvious boulder you come to on the left of the trail. It has bolts near the top. How, why and who put them in is unknown.
